func1.desc1: In the session window, go to the settings page you want to submit the assistant to by clicking the top right corner menu;
func1.desc2: Click the 'Submit to Assistant Marketplace' button in the top right corner.
func1.title: Submit via FastGPT

func2.desc: If you want to add the assistant to the index, create an entry in the plugins directory using agent-template.json or agent-template-full.json, write a brief description and appropriate tags, then create a pull request.
func2.title: Submit via Github

search.placeholder: Search for assistant names, descriptions, or keywords...
